summary:
Amaterasu-ōmikami is a part of the Japanese myth cycle and also a major deity of the Shinto religion. She is the goddess of the sun, but also of the universe. The name Amaterasu derived from Amateru meaning "shining in heaven." (Wiki)

In Skyrim she can be found near the Whiterun's Dragonsreach throne.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/ami1headerhpkleqzou1.jpg[/img]

[size=6]DESCRIPTION[/size]

[size=3]Amaterasu-ōmikami is a part of the Japanese myth cycle and also a major deity of the Shinto religion. She is the goddess of the sun, but also of the universe. The name Amaterasu derived from Amateru meaning "shining in heaven." (Wiki)

In Skyrim she can be found near the Whiterun's Dragonsreach throne.


[/size][size=6]FOR PLAYERS[/size]

[size=4]Requirements[/size]
[list=1][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url] - configuration panel[/size]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=4]Installation[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list=1][*][size=3]Install requirements list[/size]
[*][size=3]Download "Amaterasu - The Great Spirit"[/size]
[*][size=3]Extract to the Skyrim "Data" folder[/size]
[*][size=3]Enable ESP in your load order list[/size]
[*][size=3]Done[/size]
[/list]
[size=4]Uninstallation[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list=1][*][size=3]Just remove all related files[/size]
[/list][size=6]
[/size][size=6]COMPATIBILITY[/size]

[list=1]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] v4-0-0 Beta 13[/size]
[*][size=3]This mod does not modify anything, but adds a new content. In most cases you shouldn't get any trouble with other mods.[/size]
[/list][size=6]
FOR DEVELOPERS - THIS MOD NEEDS YOUR HELP ![/size]
[size=3]
While Ammy looks good already, the actual work is not finished yet.[/size]

[size=4]What has been done[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]The main body was taken from the Skyrim "wolf.nif" and only extra parts were added. These parts were carefully weighted. The rest body left as is and should work perfectly with the Skyrim game[/size]
[*][size=3]Normals were completely reviewed on the whole body. In case if you wish to edit source, please be careful with that stuff - that seems very easy to screw everything[/size]
[*][size=3]"Fur" part is copied as is. Ignore this in the 3DS Max file[/size]
[*][size=3]A draft texture for the main body looks good already ...[/size]
[/list]
[size=4]What should be done[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]Translation. If you are a native speaker of a language different from English, and willing to help with translation - please let me know.[/size]
[*][size=3]If you are native English speaker, your contribution with spelling check will be greatly appreciated.[/size]
[*][size=3]Texturing is not my area of expertise. Should you a skillful artist and willing to help, please download the sources and make your version.[/size]
[*][size=3]Particle system in the Skyrim has lack of documentation. It is required to finish the draft work about this, so it would look like in the Okami game.[/size]
[/list][size=6]
FAQ & TROUBLESHOOTING[/size]
[size=3]
[color=#ffff00]Q.[/color] Nothing has changed after update
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] It always been a big head pain for mod-developers and players. Try the following:

[/size][list][*][size=3]completely remove files[/size]
[*][size=3]then make a new save[/size]
[*][size=3][OPTIONAL] clean up your save with "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363]Save cleaner[/url]"[/size]
[*][size=3]install mod files and load the game[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[color=#ffff00]Q.[/color] I got a blob behind my character
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] This issue was a part of v1.1.2 and earlier. In order to remove blob from your current save, you may need to transform yourself into a beast or vampire form. This is the only way known today. 

[color=#ffff00]Q.[/color] A follower says "[color=#ffd966]I got somebody following me already[/color]", but I don't
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] Type in console: "[color=#00ff00]set playerfollowercount to 0[/color]"

[color=#ffff00]Q.[/color] I am a developer and can't compile a scripts
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] Download and install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] scripts into your [color=#00ff00]./Skyrim/Data/Scripts[/color] and [color=#00ff00]./Skyrim/Data/Scripts/Sources[/color] folders[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=6]
CREDITS AND PERMISSIONS[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]Clover Studio and Capcom for their Ōkami game series[/size]
[*][size=3]Skyrim developers for a great sandbox[/size]
[*][size=3]Sylom from [url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/]"Translators' Brotherhood"[/url] for their translated version in French[/size]
[*][size=3]Anyone who makes a buzz, contributes, gives a feedback, suggests a new features, and points on issues. Thank you folks - you rock![/size]
[*][size=3]Unknown author of the base body texture. Special signs - scar on the right eye. If you acknowledged your work, please let me know.[/size]
[/list][size=6]
RELEASE NOTES[/size]

[size=4]v1.1.3 - 06/17/2016[/size]
[size=3]
[list]
[*][size=3]Added version and build details in the settings menu[/size]
[*][size=3]Fixed an issue with a teleport effect. Now it should not generate a blob behind a main character. In order to remove blob from your current save, you may need to transform yourself into a beast or vampire form. This is the only way known today. Many thanks to Dilwolf for pointing to this bug[/size]
[*][size=3]Fixed an issue with a buggy Amaterasu race available under the race selection menu[/size]
[/list][/size]
[size=4]v1.1.2 - 08/31/2014[/size]
[size=3]
[list]
[*][size=3]Teleport effect got a slight change, and will look a little more esthetic[/size]
[*][size=3]"Call Amaterasu" shout will trigger a messages. You may disable them in the configuration panel[/size]
[*][size=3]You can now disable "Call Amaterasu" shout AI option in the configuration panel as well[/size]
[*][size=3]Particles effect got a huge cleanup work. Though it's still in prototype state - keep it turned OFF, if you don't like it[/size]
[*][size=3]Compatibility with Extensible Follower Framework[/size]
[*][size=3]Second loading screen should not be so frequent now[/size]
[*][size=3]Fixed a text misspell ("Amaterasu" to "Amateru") on the first loading screen[/size]
[*][size=3]General code cleanups[/size]
[/list][/size]
[size=4]v1.1.0 - 08/24/2014[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]"Call Amaterasu" shout has been implemented. Check Amaterasu inventory for a tome[/size]
[*][size=3]Extra loading screen has been added[/size]
[*][size=3]Particles effect is now optional and turned off by default[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Amaterasu is not overpowered anymore. Although high level players can use a "Power bonus" option to make her stronger again[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]SkyUI is a new requirement to support a configuration panel[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]General fixes and a files cleanup[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4]v1.0.0 - 08/19/2014
[/size][size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]Initial upload[/size]
[/list]

[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/ammyconcept2kerw5f90ng.jpg[/img]
author: somebody
